author: Daniel Newhauser, Alex Lubben, Christina Sterbenz
title: “We’re Literally Just Spraying It With Alcohol”: How Doctors and Nurses are Cleaning Their Masks
description: “Or wiping it with a Clorox wipe, which is not optimal.”
content:
